text: bitidenek’imi ‘aferi behonini gize ina adisi fit’ireti inihonaleni maletachewi (talak’i) dinik’i newi፡፡ inezihi ineziya begetachewi yekaduti nachewi፡፡ inezihimi inizazilawochi be’anigetochachewi layi yalubachewi nachewi፡፡ inezihami ye’isati gwadochi nachewi፡፡ inesu bewisit’wa zewitariwochi nachewi፡፡
